name: Platform Guy
description:
UPDATED VERSIONS OF GAME APPEAR AT THE BOTTOM OF THE DOWNLOAD LIST.

In early development. Testing out ideas for platforming and learning about making games.

Unzip into a folder and run the game.

-the timer is tied to the frame rate so it doesnt work correctly
-use the mouse to move around the menu and select using left mouse button
-jump off of the walls and into the purple rotating box to go to next level
-clicking submit opens a text box allowing you to enter text thats saved to a txt file

I have some sounds in the game, no music yet. Very early version of game.
